Key Match Events: Naseem Shah hit two sixes in the final over to win the match for Pakistan.
Pakistan won by one wicket with four balls remaining.
Shadab Khan scored 36 runs to help Pakistan's chase.
Fareed Ahmad and Fazalhaq Farooqi each took 3 wickets for Afghanistan.
Haris Rauf took 2 wickets for 26 runs for Pakistan.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz hit back-to-back sixes in the second over.
Najibullah Zadran hit a six off Shadab Khan but was later dismissed trying to repeat the shot.
Post-Match Reflections: Naseem Shah's hits led to frenzied celebrations in the Pakistan camp and a tearful exit for his opponents.
The result eliminated both Afghanistan and defending champions India from the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's slow start included Babar Azam's first-ball duck and Fakhar Zaman's run-out.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman conceded just five runs off his three powerplay overs.
Rashid Khan trapped Mohammad Rizwan lbw with a googly.
